### U-Med Customer
- **Duration**: June 2023 - November 2023
- **Description**: A Complete flutter medical services app made for united medical services co. this was a freelance project I developed the app from scratch till deploying it to google play store, Firebase and bloc pattern are used in this app. It has many features such as in-app payment, google maps, qr code scanner and more. This is the customer version.

You can talk to the doctor directly through chat and explain what you are suffering from and your specific health problems.
